name: Badger Party
description:
Badger Party!

Multiplayer, Family Friendly 3d Platformer. Collect the party supplies and meet your friends at the party!

Badger Party is a skill based, family friendly, multiplayer cooperative 3d platformer!

Collect the party supplies from the boxes hidden around each of the three biomes! The Freshy Blossom Lake, the Messy Desert and the Gildar Glaciers!

Complete with multiplayer match making and lobby, music, custom artwork and intractable characters!

Fun for all ages.

Badger party - created for the Messy Community Game Jam.

Controls:
W, A, S, D to move around.
Space, twice for double jump.
Shift to run.
Page Up + Page Down will increase / decrease volume.
